author: Mike Camp
comment: The weather information keeps crashing that's the whole reason I got it. On my Nixon mission. Fix it and I'll give 5 stars

author: Bob Hodgetts
comment: I am having trouble installing the SO3 Watchface onto Huawei Watch 3439. I have a Samsung S8 phone.

author: Adam Suraja
comment: I have no idea why they dont like this watch face

author: Alvaro Ivan Ramirez
comment: Beautiful and very functional, unfortunately battery life was cut in half so had to uninstall it.

author: Francisco Ramos
comment: It does not install on lg watch

author: Jeffrey Blattman
comment: Beautiful face, but unacceptable battery drain. I normally get 30 hours with other faces, but I'm only getting 12 with this face. Unfortunately, we have to go past our refund window to find this out.  Other than that, this is the perfect geek watch face. There's an incredible amount of data organized into the various faces.

author: John Karbassi
comment: Easily my favorite watch face, but echoing others, battery drain is terrible compared to other faces.  I go from 36 - 48 hours on other faces to barely 12 on this face.  All settings set to slowest refresh, GPS disabled, etc.  Would LOVE an update that helped battery life!

author: P Dermody
comment: Never installed! Doesn't even show up in my wear app. Could have just thrown money in the street.

author: Brandyn Schulz
comment: Great watch face only issue is every time my phone uses its gps to refresh the altimeter and accelerometer it clear the watch faces weather and will not bring it back unless I go into the watch settings and hit refresh. And this is for the LG Urbane 2nd edition. If that can be fixed ill be happy to give you 5 stars.

author: Jay Harper
comment: I've had to change my review. Please, please get the weather info fixed. It works for a few minutes then cuts out with nothing available.

author: Damon Muldavin
comment: I just bought this watch but it's not installing on my LG Sport watch.  I tried earlier but got a refund, trying again but still no luck, but no option for a refund again?  So I paid for nothing?

author: Hooshang Jahan
comment: in this watch face contact & fit dont work true.please remove them.
title: hi.

author: Philmore Harrison
comment: Great watch face, but the weather forecast need to me in two digits, not three digits! would be great if the developer could fix this ASAP

author: Riku Rompotti
comment: Every detail you need on your wrist

author: Chris J
comment: Was great crashes on wear 2.0

author: crazy cujo owner
comment: Sweet face!!!!

author: Danny Kirk
comment: Step counter works well , and is very accurate on my huawei watch. More accurate then google fit and daily tracking. Weather works OK but not as accurate as the weather icon on my watch. Major problem is the battery drain. 6% per hour is too much! I even have heart rate , ambient mode and tilt to wake off.

author: Derek Mendiola
comment: Love the watchface but periodically force closes and causes the contacts to stop working.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Could you give us more information about your situation.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Causing Contact errors

author: Péter Madai
comment: Calendars cannot be selected in settings and no calendar data is shown on my watch. Probably using multiple colors (text/values) would improve the design significantly.
title: No calendar info

author: Haim Levy
comment: How do I change the weather provider?

author: Kevin Newton
comment: Love the watchface just what I was looking for all in one

author: Jason Donnelly
comment: Great

author: Luis Rivera
comment: Face is very beautiful even when is in ambient mode. Is perfect for traveling since it gives you a lot of information about different countries hours and a complete weather forecast. The app is a little bit hard to find in the store and also apparently it doesn't install standalone in your phone. If you factory reset your watch you will not find the face in the Android Wear app and you will have to install the face again from the Store.
title: My favorite watch face for the LG Urbane

author: Jack Packlaian
comment: Weather is not accurate most times. 5th star when resolved.
title: Great, useful face!! But....

author: Silviu Popa
comment: Nice WatchFace The weather did not update and it is a bit more battery consuming

author: Peter Jones
comment: Found some issues, after weeks of continuos lock ups of my S7 phone dialer and poor watch battery performance i have uninstalled this watchface, now my watch only used 23% in 12 hours and my phone has not locked up at all, I think I found the cause was this watchface. Its a shame as it is an awesome face

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
We 've updated the app and battery performance improved.
If you have a question,please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Energy hog

author: Ilias K
comment: Ok, i will not write the whole thing again, pls fix the weather data caching to keep the data until next weather update. All data is still lost after few minutes or when disconnected and regardless of update interval. I will give 5 stars on all when this gets fixed
title: Best watchface (when it works)

author: Arif Zainal
comment: The weather gets discounted continuously and it drains the battery.
title: It's ok

author: Anthony Scriba
comment: Awesome design and functionality, only criticism is not enough updates and long time between new releases. Keep up the great work!
title: Another Great WatchFace

author: Steven Skula
comment: 2nd face I have paid for that locks up parts of my phone even after a factory reset. Dev will not reply and past time for refund. Purchase at your risk. As soon as I Uninstaller my phone does not lock up. No one face does it but ones from this dev.
title: Locks up my phone

author: Daniel Mourad
comment: Since the update it uses much more battery life! Try to fix that!!!!
